definition: to live forever/eternal life/all one's life
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: We declare him anathematized and excommunicated and we judge him condemned to eternal fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们宣告他被诅咒及驱逐出教，并断定他不得永生。

sentences.english: Both daughter and mother are immortal.
sentences.chinese: 女儿和母亲都得已永生。

sentences.english: But for a Sith, immortality was a futile pursuit.
sentences.chinese: 但对西斯而言，永生的追求只是枉然。

sentences.english: Death's End. The title of the final installment gives away what is coming, but whose death?
sentences.chinese: 最终本的书名《死神永生》透露了结局，但谁的死亡？

sentences.english: Objective To establish and preserve the immortal lymphoblastoid cell lines of the Baiku Yao population in china.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立和保存白裤瑶B淋巴母细胞永生细胞株。

sentences.english: You are a dweller in my deathless dreams.
sentences.chinese: 你是我永生梦幻中的居住者。

sentences.english: All worshiping and praising the eternal God.
sentences.chinese: 都一同敬拜称颂永生真神。

sentences.english: The Life Eternal but a baseless dream?
sentences.chinese: 永生会变作无稽的梦想。

sentences.english: The taking of the veil or the frock is a suicide paid for with eternity.
sentences.chinese: 戴上面纱或穿上僧衣是一种取得永生的自杀。

sentences.english: The Celebrant receives the Body of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 愿基督的圣血，护祐我得到永生。

sentences.english: I can feed you for all eternity.
sentences.chinese: 我可以喂养你直到永生。

sentences.english: Choose to walk on the path of Jesus, the path leads to eternal life.
sentences.chinese: 选择走在耶稣的道路上，就是那通到永生的路。

sentences.english: Real love will stick together ever and forever.
sentences.chinese: 真正的爱，粘在一起，永生永世分不开。

sentences.english: And so, armed with a soul, as it were, there's at least the possibility of immortality.
sentences.chinese: 因此，拥有一个灵魂，实际上，至少有永生的可能性。

sentences.english: Your eyes, I would not be living in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼睛，是我永生不会再遇的海。

sentences.english: 54Whoever eats my flesh and drinks my blood has eternal life, and I will raise him up at the last day.
sentences.chinese: 吃我肉喝我血的人就有永生，在末日我要叫他复活。

definition: to rest/to go to sleep/to rest in peace/(history) Parthia
eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
life (as the characteristic of living beings)/living being/creature/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
